entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:19 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
